1083680.name: HeroOfMetal-Episode01 Demo
1083680.description:
How to play this demo
This is a 2d pixel style Single player Shooting game.
There is a load time that needs to wait after the game is opened.
Support keyboard and controller .
We prepare a short level for you to experience which will be included in Episode01.

Background&Story of this game
The time of the story takes place in the future cyberpunk.
The player will play the role called "Rayn" in the game.

If you like this game,please give us comment or feedback,we will like to hear it.
Thank you for your support,we will do our best!

Blacksmith Game Studio
